TraitDef.label: Radiant
TraitDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has been chosen by ancient forces and gifted with mystical abilities.

li.label: Bonded Initiate
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has formed a bond with a spren, a mysterious entity from the Cognitive Realm. The path to knighthood has begun.

li.label: Sworn Protector
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has begun to understand their connection with the spren. Their ability to manipulate Stormlight grows.

li.label: Skybound Windrunner
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has deepened their bond, gaining increased control over Stormlight and the ability to move through the air.

li.label: Knight Radiant - Windrunner
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has spoken their final oath and become a true Knight Radiant. Their mastery over Stormlight allows them to summon a Shardblade at will.
